thread.title: As fulltime CEO, Jack Dorsey wants to make Twitter 'great' and impact the world
thread.title_full: As fulltime CEO, Jack Dorsey wants to make Twitter 'great' and impact the world - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: As fulltime CEO, Jack Dorsey wants to make Twitter 'great' and impact the world
text: He has been interim CEO for some time now, but today Jack Dorsey has been officially appointed as CEO of Twitter. Three months after Dick Costolo stepped down from the role, Dorsey is now the head of not only Square, but also Twitter, bringing to an end months of rumor and speculation. As one of the founders of the company, Dorsey has an unrivalled knowledge of where Twitter comes from, what is at its heart, and where it should be heading. The board of Twitter is due for an overhaul, and one of the first announcements is the appointment of… [Continue Reading] »
